page.title: 14PRISON PROTEST AT DENBURY
page.content:
In Denbury there is a prison called Channings Wood and it is run by the Home Office.They dont have major criminals there at the moment but they are thinking of taking people who have committed more serious crimes and who have to serve longer sentences. There was a protest meeting held in Denbury Village Hall on 17th June. I do not think it is a good idea to have these prisoners at Denbury. Many minor offenders have already escaped and this will get much worse. The Home Office would have to make the security better.If they did that,Channings Wood would gradually become a Category B prison, and we would have many more dangerous prisoners.
Melanie Ottewell Age 10
